ConnectivityType.description: The connectivity type of the connection. Additional connectivity types may be added over time.

values.description: The connection connects through the cloud and can be shared with others.
The connection connects through the cloud and cannot be shared with others.
The connection connects through an on-premises data gateway.
The connection connects through a personal on-premises data gateway.
The connection connects through a virtual network data gateway.
The connection connects through the cloud using an implicit data connection. This option is only available for specific scenarios like semantic models that use Single Sign-On (SSO).”
The connection is not bound

PrivacyLevel.description: The privacy level setting of the connection. Additional privacy levels may be added over time.

values.description: No privacy level setting is configured.

Connections set to private contain sensitive or confidential information. Visibility can be restricted to authorized users. Data from a private connection won't fold in to other connections, including other private connections.
Connections set to organizational can fold in to private and other organizational connections. They can't fold in to public connections. Visibility is set to a trusted group.
Files, internet connections, and workbook data can be set to public. Data can fold in to other connections. Visibility is available to everyone.

CredentialType.description: The credential type of the connection. Additional credential types may be added over time.

values.description: Connection uses Windows authentication to connect. Only supported for on-premises gateways.
Connection uses anonymous authentication to connect.
Connection uses basic authentication to connect.
Connection uses key authentication to connect.
Connection uses OAuth 2.0 authentication to connect.
Connection uses Windows (without the option for impersonation) authentication to connect. Only supported for on-premises gateways (personal mode).
Connection uses shared access signature (SAS) authentication to connect.
Connection uses service principal authentication to connect.
Connection uses workspace identity authentication to connect.

SingleSignOnType.description: The single sign-on type of the connection. Additional single sign on types may be added over time.

values.description: Connection does not use single sign-on to connect.
Connection uses Kerberos single sign-on to connect.
Connection uses Microsoft Entra ID single sign-on to connect.
Connection uses Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) single sign-on to connect.
Connection uses Kerberos DirectQuery and Refresh single sign-on to connect.

ConnectionEncryption.description: The connection encryption type of the connection. Additional connection encryption values may be added over time.

values.description: The connection attempt is made using an encrypted connection.
The connection attempt is first made using an encrypted connection, then falls back to unencrypted connection if unsuccessful.
The connection attempt is made using an unencrypted connection.

DataType.description: The data type of the connection creation parameter value. Additional data type values may be added over time.

values.description: Use text as the parameter input value.
Use number as the parameter input value (integer or floating point).
Use boolean as the parameter input value. False - the value is false, True - the value is true.
Use duration as the parameter input value, using [-]P(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S format. For example: P3DT4H30M10S (for 3 days, 4 hours, 30 minutes, and 10 seconds).
Use date as the parameter input value, using YYYY-MM-DD format.
Use date time as the parameter input value, using YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.FFFZ format.
Use date time zone as the parameter input value, using YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.FFF±hh:mm format.
Use time as the parameter input value, using HH:mm:ss.FFFZ format.

dataType.description: The data type of the parameter.

value.description: The duration value using [-]P(n)DT(n)H(n)M(n)S format. For example: P3DT4H30M10S (for 3 days, 4 hours, 30 minutes, and 10 seconds).
The date value using YYYY-MM-DD format.
The date time value using YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.FFFZ format.
The date time zone value using YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.FFF±hh:mm format.
The time value using HH:mm:ss.FFFZ format.

ConnectionDetails.description: The base object of connection details.

ListConnectionDetails.description: The connection details output for list operations.

CreateConnectionDetails.description: The connection details input for create operations.

creationMethod.description: The creation method used to create the connection. For a list of creation methods use the [ListSupportedConnectionTypes](/rest/api/fabric/core/connections/list-supported-connection-types) API.

parameters.description: The list of connection parameters. For a list of parameters for each creation method use the [ListSupportedConnectionTypes](/rest/api/fabric/core/connections/list-supported-connection-types) API.

OnPremisesCredentialEntry.description: A gateway ID and its encrypted serialized credentials.

gatewayId.description: The object ID of the gateway.

encryptedCredentials.description: The encrypted serialized .json of the list of name value pairs. Name is a credential name and value is a credential value. Encryption is performed using the Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA) encryption algorithm with the on-premises gateway member's public key.

credentialType.description: The credential type of the connection.

OnPremisesGatewayCredentials.description: Credentials for authenticating through an on-premises gateway.

credentialType.description: The credential type of the connection.

values.description: The credential payload to send to the on-premises gateway.

OnPremisesGatewayPersonalCredentials.description: Credentials for authenticating through an on-premises gateway (personal mode).

credentialType.description: The credential type of the connection.

encryptedCredentials.description: The encrypted serialized .json of the list of name value pairs. Name is a credential name and value is a credential value. Encryption is performed using the Rivest-Shamir-Adleman (RSA) encryption algorithm with the on-premises gateway's public key.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the service principal.

servicePrincipalClientId.description: The client ID of the service principal.

servicePrincipalSecret.description: The secret of the service principal.

CredentialDetails.description: The base object of credential details.

singleSignOnType.description: The single sign-on type of the connection.

connectionEncryption.description: The connection encryption setting that is used during the test connection.

skipTestConnection.description: Whether the connection should skip the test connection during creation and update. True - Skip the test connection, False - Do not skip the test connection.

ListCredentialDetails.description: The credential details returned when fetching a connection.

credentialType.description: The credential type of the connection.

singleSignOnType.description: (Optional) The single sign-on type of the connection. When no value is passed, the connection doesn't use single sign-on.

connectionEncryption.description: (Optional) The connection encryption setting that is used during the test connection. When no value is passed, the connection is not encrypted.

skipTestConnection.description: Whether the connection should skip the test connection during creation and update. True - Skip the test connection, False - Do not skip the test connection. When no value is passed, this is set to 'False'.

CreateCredentialDetails.description: The credential details input for creating a connection.

CreateOnPremisesCredentialDetails.description: The credential details input for creating an on-premises gateway connection.

UpdateCredentialDetails.description: The credential details input for updating a connection.

UpdateOnPremisesGatewayCredentialDetails.description: The credential details input for updating an on-premises gateway connection.

UpdateOnPremisesGatewayPersonalCredentia.description: The credential details input for updating an on-premises gateway connection.

connectivityType.description: The connectivity type of the connection.

displayName.description: The display name of the connection. Maximum length is 200 characters.

connectionDetails.description: The connection details of the connection.

privacyLevel.description: (Optional) The privacy level of the connection. When no value is passed, this is set to 'Organizational'.

gatewayId.description: The object ID of the primary gateway of the on-premises gateway that the connection is created under.

credentialDetails.description: The credential details of the connection.

gatewayId.description: The object ID of the virtual network gateway that the connection is created under.

name.description: The name of the connection creation parameter.

dataType.description: The data type of the connection creation parameter.

required.description: Whether the connection creation parameter is required. True - The connection creation parameter is required, False - The connection creation parameter is not required.

allowedValues.description: A list of allowed values for the connection creation parameter.

name.description: The name of the creation method.

parameters.description: A list of creation method parameters for the connection.

creationMethods.description: A list of creation methods for the connection.

supportedCredentialTypes.description: A list of credential type values that the connection supports.

supportedConnectionEncryptionTypes.description: A list of connection encryption values that the connection supports.

supportsSkipTestConnection.description: Whether the connection type supports skip test connection. True - The connection type supports skip test connection, False - The connection type does not support skip test connection.

value.description: A list of supported connection types returned.

role.description: The connection role of the principal.

role.description: The connection role of the principal.

id.description: The object ID of the connection role assignment.

value.description: A list of connection role assignments.

values.description: Enables user access for the connection.
Enables user with resharing access for the connection.
Enables ownership access for the connection.
